header_text: At work you've noticed more difficulty typing. You decide to email your boss to ask to take time off to focus on your health. You see a reply pop up in your email after a while, and you feel scared.

elements.Text: You did not want to ask for time off because...

elements.name: At work you've noticed more difficulty typing. You decide to email your boss to ask to take time off to focus on your health. You see a reply pop up in your email after a while, and you feel scared. _Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
buttons: You did not need time off
